data.eml:eml: A taxonomic review of the polymorphic assassin bug genus Rihirbus Stål (Hemiptera: Reduviidae: Harpactorinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Gao, Feng, Zhao, Ping, Webb, Mick, Cai, Wanzhi (2015): A taxonomic review of the polymorphic assassin bug genus Rihirbus Stål (Hemiptera: Reduviidae: Harpactorinae). Zootaxa 3963 (4): 502-516, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3963.4.2
